ability.Battle Blaze: This Pokemon's Fire attacks cause additional damage equal to the opponent Pokemon's all positive stat stages x10.
ability.Dragon Fury: When this Pokemon's HP drops below 50%, its Dragon-type moves deal 1.5x damage.

Blazing Assault.effect: Has a 20% chance to burn the target.

Draco Sweep.effect: Reduces the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

Ignition Burst.effect: Always results in a critical hit if the user's HP is below 30%.

Wing Slash.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Flare Blitz.effect: Recoil damage equal to 1/3 of the damage dealt.
